## Coursera Week 4 Project

This project contains the elements of the Week 4 Project detailed below:

1. Create a Shiny application and deploy it on Rstudio's servers.
2. Use Rstudio Presenter to prepare a reproducible pitch presentation about the application.

Application requirements:

Some form of input (widget: textbox, radio button, checkbox, ...)
Some operation on the ui input in sever.R
Some reactive output displayed as a result of server calculations
Enough documentation so that a novice user could use your application
Documentation should be at the Shiny website

Reproducible pitch requirements:

5 page presentation completed in R Presenter
Contains an expression that is evaluated
Hosted on github or Rpubs
Server calculation displayed in the html page
No R errors displayed in the presentation
